text: The Ambassador of Malaysia to the Republic of Turkey is the head of Malaysia's diplomatic mission to Turkey. The position has the rank and status of an Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary and is based in the Embassy of Malaysia, Ankara. ==List of heads of mission== ===Chargés d'Affaires to Turkey=== {| class=wikitable ! Chargé d'AffairesHead of Mission - Embassy of Malaysia, AnkaraNewsletter May - August 2016 ! Term start ! Term end |- ! colspan=3| Accredited from Tehran, Iran |- | Ahmad Zainal Abidin Yusof || 11 May 1971 || 11 February 1973 |- | Yusof Zainal || 19 April 1973 || 1975 |- | Yusof Rawa || 17 October 1975 || 30 May 1978 |} ===Ambassadors to Turkey=== {| class=wikitable ! Rajaram || 26 October 1989 || 22 May 1991 |- | Zaibedah Ahmad || 1991 || January 1996 |- | Abdul Jalil Haron || 27 December 1996 || July 2000 |- | Melanie Leong Sock Lei || 12 September 2000 || 17 July 2003 |- | Ahmad Mokhtar Selat || 10 October 2003 || 2 February 2006 |- | Saipul Anuar Abd Muin || 27 March 2007 || 23 January 2014 |- | Amran Mohamed Zin || 12 March 2014 || 30 June 2016 |- | Abd Razak Abdul Wahab || 18 August 2016 || Incumbent |} ==See also== * Malaysia–Turkey relations == References == Turkey Malaysia
title: List of ambassadors of Malaysia to Turkey
